WorkItem.ClosedComment: DoneA simple method for grouping Toolbar Buttons has been implemented that didn't take very much additional code. Still trying to keep this thing as lightweight as possible.
WorkItem.Description: Since the number of Toolbar Buttons is growing in the 0.6.0 release; it would be nice to be able to have the button separated into some kind of Groups and/or Rows.
WorkItem.Summary: Add ability to have Toolbar Button Groups
